title: Client needs bug fixes
body: I got a 20 min queue for having internet issues and I understand why I got this but anyway , I was waiting and at about 22 mins I got a queue and I clearly clicked accept , and it sat there for longer than usual so , I figured we were just getting into champion select but then it said I declined it and is now making me do the 20 mins again. Please fix this!!

replies.body: The same kinda crap happened to me. I locked in for a ranked game and the client just crashes outa nowhere. It also happened to me in a ranked game and caused me to lose. This new client has a lot of issues that need to be fixed. I dislike being penalized by riot for their clients' mistakes. Why RITO? Whyyyyyyy??? {{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

When you join the queue, the server is trying to move you into the same group with everyone else.  If you fail to join or get left behind too many times then you'll end up with a queue dodge timer.  I suggest going over the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help resolve whatever is causing you to fall back.  Let me know if you have any questions!
He's saying he clicked accept and the client bugged out and thought he decline, NOT DODGE, but decline. happened to me when the client first came out but only once.
Indeed, to clarify, constantly declining a match will results in a queue dodge timer.  Hope that helps clear things up!
